TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Sorry, sir, but our food supply enterprise does not appreciate the intentionally genderized job names. Not "waitress", but " waiting person", please. Their duties are to wait while a sleepy customer is trying to read three lines in the menu and finally decide what they wish to order for their five dollars and twenty five cents.

Hurrier! Yes, you. Hurry up, don't wait!

Are you going to order? We are in a hurry.

Farrier, please see to my horse.

No problem. Take this chili pepper and apply it to the horse nozzle. It will far go to Fargo.

Pretender! That pretty bottle, please.

It is at the Foo Fighters concert.

Excuse me Mr Nightman, is this the Hotel California?

Almost so, sahib. We call it hotel of Kali.

Spoiler


Barista! I want some coffee. Please, call the coffista.

In a moment Sir. they just need some cough syrup.

Are we all just prisoners here?

Much worse. We are the wardens. Any order, sir?

Dogtender! A hot dog, please!

Right, you're nicked son, get him Rex.

Waiter, a Quickease please.

Our quook is quooking it from ququmbers, quickly and easily.

Melon! A Elbereth Gilthoniel! Lembas, please. And two dwarf beers.

 

Edited 21 hours ago by kerbiloid

There are 7 gentlemen at the next table who like a word about you trying to take their beers.

Gater, there is a 502 in my soup.

Be happy, it isn't 404.

Melon elvish! Melon english!

One melon martini.

Gator, is this swamp soup?
